name: Bloodpetal Zapper
tooltip:
Bloodpetal ZapperLevel 53

For the zapper to work, it needs a sample of the target creature. Head out into the crater and collect a Bloodpetal sprout. Then I can calibrate it to work on Muigin's little friends...

If he weren't so stubborn, we could be on our way home, already... But until then, I'll just have to show him that his little prank doesn't bother me at all!

Requirements:
- Bloodpetal Sprout
